title: Stagecraft fundamentals : a guide and reference for theatrical production
subject: Théâtre -- Production et mise en scène
PERFORMING ARTS -- Theater -- General
Theater -- Production and direction
creator: Carver, Rita Kogler, author.$$QCarver, Rita Kogler
description: "Stagecraft Fundamentals tackles every aspect of basic theatre production with Rita Kogler Carver's signature witty and engaging voice. The history of stagecraft, safety precautions, lighting, costumes, scenery, career planning tips, and more are discussed, illustrated by beautiful color examples that both display step-by-step procedures and break with the traditionally boring black and white introductory theatre book. This third edition improves upon the last, featuring two new chapters on props and projection design, expanded discussion on LED lighting, stage automation, digital technology, stage management, theatre management, and sound design, new end of chapter questions that tie in with chapter objectives, and a redesigned companion website that organizes resources and links clearly by chapter and resource type, making this the must have introductory theatre production book"-- Provided by publisher.
contents: Part One: History and art -- Where we've been and where we're going : a brief history and introduction -- It's all about collaboration : design for theatre -- Making it visual : composition -- Black and white are colors too! Color theory -- Creating the stage picture : drawing, rendering, and drafting -- Part Two : Safety and scenery -- Safety first! Safety -- Setting it all up : scenic tools and materials -- How to get it done : scenery standard techniques and practices -- Deck the halls : props -- A little dab will do ya : paint -- Part Three : Rigging and lighting -- Handing by the thread : rigging -- House to half... : lighting -- Is this thing on? Sound -- Part Four : Costume and makeup -- All dressed up with someplace to go : costume -- Put on a happy face : hair and makeup -- Part Five : Projections and special effects -- Beyond hand puppets : projections -- The magic behind the curtain : special effects -- Part Six : Stage management and careers -- Warning, standby, go! Stage management -- Taking the show on the road : touring -- What's next? Career choices -- Appendix A : Glossary of terms -- Appendix B : Story time - theatre traditions -- Appendix C : Photos and image credits -- Index.
relation: $$Cform$$VPrint version: Stagecraft fundamentals New York : Routledge, 2019.$$QStagecraft fundamentals$$Z9995716331107871
